job_description:
Role: Senior UI Developer

Location: Toronto/Remote

Duration: 6-12+ Months

Job Description
Angularjs, Reactjs, Html
Responsibilities
Develop and maintain UI screens using Angular 7 and above, React JS, HTML5/CSS3
Proactively help refine and improve the team's development standards and processes.
Communicate with team and other production personnel.
Develop and test code, debug programs and integrate applications with third-party web services
Requirements
5+ years of experience as UI Developer
Expertise in UI framework such as Angular 7 and above, React JS
Expertise in HTML5/CSS3
Expertise in NPM, Type Script, Angular CLI, Java Script
Strong unit test and debugging skills
Familiarity with front-end technologies (like JavaScript and HTML5)
Familiarity with tools such as JIRA, PostMan
Strong familiarity with GIT / SVN and collaborative workflows (code review, standards, etc.)
Comfortable with Continuous Integration and Deployment tools and procedures
Experience working in an agile and international environment excellent time-management skills
Excellent oral and written communication skills and high level of motivation (self-starter)
Ability and willingness to go the extra mile and support the overall team
Analytical and problem-solving Skill
Good interpersonal skills and willing to be a team player
Provide overlap coverage with offshore/customer team
